description:
I learned several milky way image with Sigma 40mm Art, so tried 3 panel mosaic.
images taken at Death Valley Father Crowley Vista Point, actual SQM 21.76 
ISO400 f/2.8 120sec 45 subs each, x3

here is APP Mosaic setting

load 3 images
  (if there was "duplicated" result, too much overlap. crop appropriate before loading)
Analyze 3000 Stars - depends on focal length. wider = more stars
 set reference to center image
Register quadrilaterals scale Start 1, stop 10
　use dynamic distortion correction checked
　same camera and optics : remove check
　distortion margin 0.02
　registration mode = mosaic
　registration model = calibrated projective
　projection method = mercatorProjection
　move COP vertical = 19 degrees ( to adjust image center DEC = -19 degree)
　interpolation method = Cubic B-Spline
　no under/overshoot : remove check
Normalize
　mode = advanced
Integrate
　integrate = average
　weights = equal
　LNC degree = 4th
　LNC iterations = 5
　enable MBB checked, 15％
title: MilkyWay, 3 panel mosaic, Sigma 40mm Art
